title: ISic000706. I.Sicily inscription 000706
body:
Facsimile Images

d(is) m(anibus) s(acrum)
L(ucio) Arrio
Herme
vixit
5mens(es) V
dies XXV
f(ecit) b(ene) m(erenti)
Chari-
to ver-
10nae suo

Apparatus criticus

Text from Korhonen 2004

English translation

Sacred to the shades of the underworld. To Lucius Arrius Herma; he lived 5 months, 25 days. Charito made (this) for his well-deserving family slave.

translation

Den Seelen der Unterwelt gewidmet. Für Lucius Arrius Herma; er lebte für 5 Monate, 25 Tage. Charito hat (dies) gemacht für seinen verdienstvollen Sklaven.

commentary

bibliography

  • 1989.0341i https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 58 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
